job_title: ASSOCIATE DIRECTOR of OPERATIONS/PRODUCER in Maplewood, NJ
pros:
Supervised all aspects of internal operations including: traffic department, digital studio, editorial and administrative staff  • Trained new hires and staff in organizational process and procedures: including digital routing, and server use 
• Participated in all agency status meetings and monitored hot sheets and internal reports • Managed IT issues including server access approval to ensure productivity • Generated purchase orders, opened, and routed non-billable and new business jobs upon request • Initiated printing of internal documents
cons: Not really anything to say about my marketing/advertising experience. I liked all aspects.

job_title: Pharmacy Technician CPhT in Cleveland, OH
pros: Workload very easy, employees are nice and helpful feels like a family
cons: The pay is the worse but it’s the type of organization it is.

review_title: Serves great community, benefits lacking admin out of touch
job_title: Psychologist in Cleveland, OH
pros:
Long history of serving marginalized community
HRSA loan repayment 
Lots of Black women leaders
Patient population
cons:
No paternal leave
Restrictive leave policies
Lack of transparency 
Tons of turnover
Disorganized leadership

job_title: Community Health Worker in Cleveland, OH
pros:
-Great learning experience
-Fairly good benefits
cons:
-Very inflexible hours
-Very little leniency

review_title: I like working at Neon because I get to enjoy what I like to do most taking care of the adults and pediatrics patients.
job_title: Certified Medical Assistant in Cleveland, OH
pros: I like working with the adult patient and love working with the kids and the babies.
cons: They will what u to do other department jobs.

review_title: Worked at NEON for over 20 years
job_title: Anonymous Employee in Cleveland, OH
pros: No weekends or holidays, good benefits, worked with great people
cons: Supervisors are arrogant, self involved. No opportunities for promotion. No incentives.

job_title: in Taunton, MA
pros: I love it here, everyone is great.
cons: Management can be stuffy and not always the nicest.

job_title: Engineering Tech in Boulder, CO
pros: Cool project that is long term if you stay.
cons: management is very focused on itself. Maintaining position and salary.

job_title: SAE in New York, NY
pros: NeON is a small agency. It has some very talented people.
cons: Some of the departments are seriously lagging.

job_title: Health Care Practitioner in Cleveland, OH
pros: no nights or weekends which is a plus in the healthcare arena
cons: bad working conditions, poor equipment,  site supervisor tried to blackmail me to cover his stealing of health center's equipment,  office was consistently 80 degrees all year
